TEXT.TITLE: BAHIA COCOA FUTURES CLSG
TEXT.BODY: Closing prices on the Bahia Cocoa Futures Market were as follows (in cruzados per 60 kilo bag delivered Ilheus/Itabuna with previous in brackets) - May 2,560 (2,560) volume 23 lots July 3,248 (3,248) volume nil September 3,865 (3,772) volume 23 lots December 5,084 (5,000) volume nil Contract in 50 bags REUTER
